item.title: FCP, LCP, and TBT
item.description: FCP measures the time from when the page starts loading to when any part of the pageâ€™s content is rendered on the screen. This includes text, images, SVGs, and non-white canvas elements.

item.title: Metadata Object

item.title: Optimization of website
item.description: Use LightHouse to analyze the performance of you website. See TTFB and FCP, LCP, and TBT to get familiar with important performance metrics. Then read How to improve TTFB and How to improve FCP, LCP, and TBT to start optimizing your website.

item.title: TTFB
item.description: Time to First Byte (TTFB) is a metric that measures the time it takes for a userâ€™s browser to receive the first byte of data from the server after making an HTTP request ...

item.title: Home
item.description: This is my home Engineering Notes Useful template OKR template .

item.title: Bundle analyzer
item.description: How to configure bundle analyzer Install the bundle analysis package. npm install --save-dev @next/bundle-analyzer Then configure nextjs.config to use the package.

item.title: OKR template
item.description: Objective Set up3-5 high level, ambitious and qualitative goals that align with core values. Each objective should be also time-bound Write your objective Key Results How can I measure the progress? How can this outcome contribute to your mission? Write your key results Why? Why this goal is important to you? .

item.title: LightHouse
item.description: You can use Chrome extension or this website lighthouse-metrics.com/ to run analysis of your website.

item.title: Prompts for developers
item.description: The very first thing we have to figure out is the workflow you have and the find the bottleneck The worst case you can use AI Use cases Regex is the perfect use case to use ChatGPT for developers ...
